description:
One day, in the midst of practices for the athletic festival, Erika finds out that Komichi is going to dance at the festival`s after-party. She starts to imagine what would happen if she played the piano accompaniment for Komichi`s dance, but she keeps it to herself. Meanwhile, Komichi is practicing hard at volleyball, but depite the fact that it`s a major team event, their teamwork is somewhat lacking. When Touko comments that it`d be nice if they could find a place where everyone could practice together, Komichi remembers her previous school, Futaba Elementary.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On profite de ce moment… toutes ensemble
同じ時間... みんなと...
